mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QUIZ_STAT A WHERE QUIZ_DATE = #{quiz_date} ORDER BY QUIZ_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUIZ_STAT(QUIZ_DATE, DOC_CODE, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_SEQ, QUIZ_NUM, SUCCESS_YN, QUIZ_TIME) VALUES ( date_format(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') , #{doc_code} , #{quiz_number} , #{quiz_seq} , 1 , #{success_yn} , #{quiz_time})
mapper.select: SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectMaxQuizStatSeq */ IFNULL(MAX(QUIZ_SEQ), 0)+1 FROM QUIZ_STAT WHERE QUIZ_DATE = #{quiz_date}
